annonstext:
About Bravura:

Bravura är ett bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag för organisationer som vill hitta Next Gen Professionals. Hos oss finns massor av jobbmöjligheter, framförallt för dig i början av karriären med 0-8 års erfarenhet. Via oss kan du jobba som konsult eller bli rekryterad. Hitta ditt drömjobb - vi hjälper dig att lyckas!

About the job:

This recruitment is handled by Bravura but you will be employed by ScanCoin.

About the company:

About the company
PayComplete is a FinTech IoT platform for self-service financial transactions originally for cash management, but increasingly for broader payments and transactions. As a global technology company, PayComplete provides solutions and services to end-markets such as Retail, Transportation, Financial Services, Consumer Self-Service, and OEM. PayComplete’s platform powers hardware devices (native and others) to provide integrated payments, cash management and broader financial transaction solutions. In a world where devices are increasingly connected (Internet of Things) and consumers desire to manage their own financial transactions, PayComplete’s platform creates order from chaos for enterprise customers and creates a premium user experience for end-consumers. With over 1,000 employees in 19 countries worldwide, PayComplete is owned by ACON Investments LLC, a middle-market private equity investment firm responsible for managing approximately $5.9 billion of assets. 
Please visit PayComplete to learn more about the company. PayComplete is a new brand from the company previously known as ScanCoin here in Sweden.

Tasks and responsibilities:

Responsibilities
As a Mechatronic Engineer your main responsibility is development of company products (mechanical and electrical parts) in global project as a part of a cross functional project team. You are a part of the whole process from idea to industrialization and further on the maintenance throughout the product life cycle with the main tasks related to mechanical design. Common tasks include analyzing engineering sketches, specifications and related data to determine design factors such as size, shape and arrangement of parts. Evaluation and approvement of design changes and releases are also a part of your responsibility as well as ensuring compliance in production with design specifications. You also assist drafting, the test lab, manufacturing, quality and planning with setting up equipment or as required. The development is mainly driven in project forms but solitaire initiatives and working on your own is frequent.

You will work in close collaboration with the manufacturing team in Poznan, Poland and Zhuhai, China and other manufacturing sites.  As you work with people in different time zones you need to be comfortable to work with flexible working hours. Some travelling will occur especially to Poland. You report to the Head of Cash Management Solutions.

Education, Experience and Personal characteristics:

Qualifications, experiences, and personal characteristics 
• At least B.Sc. degree in Engineering
• Strong familiarity with product development of products consisting of mechanics, electronics and software
• Good experience of working with Creo for mechanical development
• Familiar with PLM/PDM systems as well as project tools like Workfront
• Hands on and familiar with setting up test equipment and know your way around in at test environment
• Excellent in English written and oral. Swedish is preferred but not a requirement

We believe that you are quality driven in every aspect of your work from the drawing board to industrialization of products to customer support. To succeed in this role, you need to be able to work independent and be self-motivated.  You must be comfortable working in a constant changing multi-cultural high pace environment. As you work with all levels of the organization and are a part of virtual teams there is a high demand on your collaboration skills.

Other information:

Other Information 
Start: Immediately with regards of notice period
Placement: Malmö
Salery: As agreed upon 

Funderingar kring Bravuras rekryteringsprocess? Du finner svar på de vanligast förekommande frågorna här

Är du nyfiken på hur vår rekryteringsprocess är upplagd? Du hittar mer information här: https://www.bravura.se/din-karriar.

Har du frågor om tjänsten eller kring din registrering är du välkommen att kontakta vår kandidatsupport på vår chatt,  EMAIL  eller  TELEPHONENO så hjälper vi dig. Ange vilken tjänst det gäller.

Vi rekommenderar att du skickar in din ansökan omgående då vi gör ett löpande urval. Välkommen med din ansökan!

Sökord: Mechantronic Engineer, Mechanical Engineer, Electrical Engineer, Engineer, Product Development, CAD, Creo Software, Mechanical Development, PLM, PDM, Workfront, Test, Hardware, Design, Malmö, Skåne, Fulltime
